style_guide.visual_style: Bright, friendly flat illustration style with warm pastel colors (soft pinks, mint greens, sunny yellows, sky blues). Clean modern aesthetic with rounded shapes and playful typography. Cheerful, welcoming mood that feels like a casual cafe meetup or sunny park encounter. Korean and English text in complementary friendly fonts.
style_guide.segment_story: Two people meeting for the first time and getting to know each other through friendly conversation. They exchange basic information (names, age, hobbies), compliment each other naturally, and build rapport that leads to an invitation to become friends over coffee. The interaction flows from initial introduction to the beginning of a potential friendship.

images.prompt_used: Wide establishing shot, two young adults meeting outdoors in a sunny park setting, one person waving hello with a warm smile while the other responds with a friendly gesture, both have open and welcoming body language suggesting a first meeting, bright pastel colored clothing in soft pinks and mint greens, cheerful cafe tables with umbrellas in the background, flowering trees and blue sky, flat illustration style with rounded shapes and clean modern aesthetic, warm and inviting atmosphere like a casual sunny day encounter, playful character designs with simple friendly faces, soft shadows and gentle lighting creating a welcoming mood
